name: Open Source Candidate Pledge
tagline: I pledge all my Congressional votes to the real-time polled majority of my constituents; overriding only after full disclosure of my reasons
body:
[NBC/WSJ poll: 60 percent say fire every member of Congress](http://firstread.nbcnews.com/_news/2013/10/10/20903531-nbcwsj-poll-60-percent-say-fire-every-member-of-congress?lite)



There has to be a BETTER way... and there is
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
